title: An Introduction to Catastrophe Insurance
summary: Insurance is a commonly used product to help minimize financial losses caused by disasters. Now, let us get to know catastrophe insurance, one of the many types of insurance, starting with its brief introduction.

title: Finance’s Enemy: The Black Swan
summary: You have probably heard of a black swan. However, black swans were considered non-existent... until they are not. Find out what the Black Swan is in the world of Finance in this article.

title: The Role of Mathematical Models in Indonesia’s COVID-19 Policies
summary: An interview with Dr. Nuning Nuraini, who was deeply involved in the governmental response of COVID-19, as part of the governmental COVID-19 Accelerated Task Force.

title: COVID-19 Chart Crimes : What’s the Problem with Our Data Visualization?
summary: The pandemic has yet to reach its end, and people have the need to be kept updated. However, not all information seems to be anyone-friendly. Check this out to know what to avoid when serving data, especially to a wider, general audience.
